title: Substitute the Value
text: Substitute $$x=-1$$ into the function, we get $$f(-1)=-{2\left(e\right)}^{\left(-1-1\right)}$$.

title: Simplify the Exponent
text: What is the value of $$e^{\left(-2\right)}$$? (Round to $$6$$ decimal places)

title: Multiply by the Coefficient
text: Multiply by the coefficient, we get $$f(-1)=-2\times7.389056=-0.2707$$
